scripts.build-wasm-golang: cd src/lib/mandelbrot_renderer/wasm/golang; cross-env GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o "../../../../../static/mandelbrot_renderer/main.wasm";
scripts.build-mandelbrot-renderer-dev: npm run build-wasm-golang; cd src/lib/mandelbrot_renderer; webpack --mode=development --devtool=inline-source-map;
scripts.build-mandelbrot-renderer-prod: npm run build-wasm-golang; cd src/lib/mandelbrot_renderer; webpack --mode=production;
scripts.dev: npm run copy-static; npm run copy-translations; npm run build-mandelbrot-renderer-dev; vite dev
scripts.build: npm run copy-static; npm run copy-translations; npm run check; npm run build-mandelbrot-renderer-prod; vite build
